sentences.sContent: I want to thank everyone who has encouraged and supported me.
sentences.sCn: 我要感谢每一位鼓励和支持过我的人。

sentences.sContent: Violent TV programmes encourage anti-social behaviour.
sentences.sCn: 暴力的电视节目助长反社会行为。

sentences.sContent: ...Office managers knock down walls to encourage team building...
...Many European governments have abandoned policies that used to encourage people to retire early...
...My mission is to encourage green hands and those lacking time or money to feed themselves...
...joining a program that Bill and Melinda Gates and Warren Buffett started in June to encourage other wealthy people to give...
...We encourage students to go on to college whether they are prepared or not...
...Teachers could encourage boys to enjoy reading and writing with "boy-focused" approaches such as themes and characters that appeal to them...

remMethod.val: en(使…) ＋ courage(精神) → 使有精神 → 鼓励

words.tran: 令人鼓舞的；鼓励的，奖励的

trans.tranOther: to give someone the courage or confidence to do something
